attributes.action: enable all british transport to be wheelchair accessible to disabled individuals now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have had enough of having to use and paying extra for taxi's to get us around, we feel that NOW is the time to move transport foreward NOT in 2020 which, as an example, is the suggested time limit by which (in the Disability Dicrimination Act of 1995 and the amendments made in 2005 to which I am now referring to) all (this e-petition is not excluding any other form of public transprt, this is merely an example) rail vehicles must be adapted for a disabled persons wheelchair access.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "enable all british transport to be wheelchair accessible to disabled individuals now"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17963
